1: -module(xep_0352_csi_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -compile([export_all]).
    6: 
    7: -define(CSI_BUFFER_MAX, 10).
    8: 
    9: all() ->
   10:     [{group, basic}].
   11: 
   12: 
   13: groups() ->
   14:     [{basic,
   15:       [parallel, shuffle],
   16:       all_tests()
   17:      }].
   18: 
   19: all_tests() ->
   20:     [
   21:      server_announces_csi,
   22:      alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived,
   23:      alice_gets_msgs_after_activate,
   24:      alice_gets_msgs_after_activate_in_order,
   25:      alice_gets_message_after_buffer_overflow,
   26:      alice_gets_buffered_messages_after_reconnection_with_sm,
   27:      alice_gets_buffered_messages_after_stream_resumption,
   28:      bob_gets_msgs_from_inactive_alice,
   29:      alice_is_inactive_but_sends_sm_req_and_recives_ack
   30:     ].
   31: 
   32: suite() ->
   33:     escalus:suite().
   34: 
   35: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   36:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   37:     dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_csi, [{buffer_max, ?CSI_BUFFER_MAX}]),
   38:     [{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   39: 
   40: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   41:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   42:     dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_csi),
   43:     escalus_fresh:clean(),
   44:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   45: 
   46: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   47:     escalus_users:update_userspec(Config, alice, stream_management, true).
   48: 
   49: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   50:     Config.
   51: 
   52: init_per_testcase(alice_gets_buffered_messages_after_reconnection_with_sm, C) ->
   53:     C;
   54: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   55:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   56: 
   57: end_per_testcase(alice_gets_buffered_messages_after_reconnection_with_sm, C) ->
   58:     C;
   59: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   60:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   61: 
   62: server_announces_csi(Config) ->
   63:     NewConfig = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{alice, 1}]),
   64:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, alice),
   65:     Steps = [start_stream,
   66:              stream_features,
   67:              maybe_use_ssl,
   68:              authenticate,
   69:              bind,
   70:              session],
   71:     {ok, _Client, _Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
   72:     true = proplists:get_value(client_state_indication, Features).
   73: 
   74: alice_is_inactive_and_no_stanza_arrived(Config) ->
   75:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   76:         given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, 1),
   77: 
   78:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice)
   79:     end).
   80: 
   81: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config) ->
   82:     alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, 1).
   83: 
   84: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate_in_order(Config) ->
   85:     alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, 3).
   86: 
   87: alice_gets_msgs_after_activate(Config, N) ->
   88:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   89:         %%Given
   90:         Msgs = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N),
   91: 
   92:         %%When client becomes active again
   93:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
   94: 
   95:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs)
   96:     end).
   97: 
   98: alice_gets_buffered_messages_after_reconnection_with_sm(Config) ->
   99:     NewConfig = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}]),
  100:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, alice),
  101:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, bob),
  102:     {ok, Alice, _AliceProps, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec),
  103:     {ok, Bob, _BobProps, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  104: 
  105:     given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  106: 
  107:     MsgsToAlice = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, 5),
  108: 
  109:     %% then Alice disconnects
  110: 
  111:     escalus_connection:kill(Alice),
  112: 
  113:     {ok, Alice2, _AliceProps2, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec),
  114: 
  115:     escalus_connection:send(Alice2, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  116: 
  117:     then_client_receives_message(Alice2, MsgsToAlice),
  118: 
  119:     ok.
  120: 
  121: alice_gets_buffered_messages_after_stream_resumption(Config) ->
  122:     ConnSteps = [start_stream,
  123:                  stream_features,
  124:                  authenticate,
  125:                  bind,
  126:                  session,
  127:                  stream_resumption],
  128:     NewConfig = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}]),
  129:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, alice),
  130:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, bob),
  131:     {ok, Alice, AliceProps, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  132:                                                           ConnSteps),
  133:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  134:     escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  135:     {ok, Bob, _BobProps, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  136: 
  137:     given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  138: 
  139:     MsgsToAlice = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, 5),
  140: 
  141:     %% then Alice disconnects
  142: 
  143:     escalus_connection:kill(Alice),
  144: 
  145:     SMID = proplists:get_value(smid, AliceProps),
  146:     ResumeSession = [start_stream,
  147:                      stream_features,
  148:                      authenticate,
  149:                      mk_resume_stream(SMID, 1)],
  150: 
  151:     PrevResource = proplists:get_value(resource, AliceProps),
  152:     PrevSpec = [{resource, PrevResource} | AliceSpec],
  153:     {ok, Alice2, _AliceProps2, _} = escalus_connection:start(PrevSpec,
  154:                                                              ResumeSession),
  155: 
  156:     escalus_connection:send(Alice2, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  157: 
  158:     then_client_receives_message(Alice2, MsgsToAlice),
  159: 
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: mk_resume_stream(SMID, PrevH) ->
  163:     fun (Conn, Props, Features) ->
  164:             escalus_connection:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:resume(SMID, PrevH)),
  165:             Resumed = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, get_resumed),
  166:             true = escalus_pred:is_sm_resumed(SMID, Resumed),
  167:             {Conn, [{smid, SMID} | Props], Features}
  168:     end.
  169: alice_gets_message_after_buffer_overflow(Config) ->
  170:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  171:         Msgs = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, ?CSI_BUFFER_MAX+5),
  172: 
  173:         {Flushed, Awaiting} = lists:split(?CSI_BUFFER_MAX+1, Msgs),
  174: 
  175:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Flushed),
  176:         %% and no other stanza
  177:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
  178:         %% Alice activates
  179:         escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"active">>)),
  180:         %% ands gets remaining stanzas
  181:         then_client_receives_message(Alice, Awaiting)
  182:     end).
  183: 
  184: 
  185: 
  186: bob_gets_msgs_from_inactive_alice(Config) ->
  187:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  188:         given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, 1),
  189: 
  190:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  191:     end).
  192: 
  193: alice_is_inactive_but_sends_sm_req_and_recives_ack(Config) ->
  194:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice,1}], fun(Alice) ->
  195:         given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  196: 
  197:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  198: 
  199:         escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  200: 
  201:     end).
  202: 
  203: given_client_is_inactive_but_sends_messages(Alice, Bob, N) ->
  204:     %%Given
  205:     MsgsToAlice = given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N),
  206: 
  207:     MsgsToBob = gen_msgs(<<"Hi, Bob">>, N),
  208:     send_msgs(Alice, Bob, MsgsToBob),
  209:     timer:sleep(1),
  210:     {MsgsToAlice, MsgsToBob}.
  211: 
  212: 
  213: then_client_receives_message(Alice, Msgs) ->
  214:     [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)) ||
  215:      Msg <- Msgs].
  216: 
  217: 
  218: given_client_is_inactive_and_messages_sent(Alice, Bob, N) ->
  219:     %%Given
  220:     given_client_is_inactive(Alice),
  221: 
  222:     timer:sleep(1000),
  223: 
  224:     %%When
  225:     Msgs = gen_msgs(<<"Hi, Alice">>, N),
  226:     send_msgs(Bob, Alice, Msgs),
  227:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  228:     Msgs.
  229: 
  230: send_msgs(From, To, Msgs) ->
  231:     [escalus:send(From, escalus_stanza:chat_to(To, Msg)) ||
  232:      Msg <- Msgs].
  233: 
  234: 
  235: gen_msgs(Prefix, N) ->
  236:     [<<Prefix/binary, (integer_to_binary(I))/binary>> || I <- lists:seq(1, N)].
  237: 
  238: given_client_is_inactive(Alice) ->
  239:     escalus:send(Alice, csi_stanza(<<"inactive">>)).
  240: 
  241: 
  242: csi_stanza(Name) ->
  243:     #xmlel{name = Name,
  244:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:csi:0">>}]}.
  245:
